SELECT tu.id, tu.nickname AS nickName, tu.head_img_url AS headImage
, CASE tgu.user_class WHEN '1' THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isLeader
FROM t_user tu
, t_group_user tgu WHERE tu.id = tgu.user_id_fk AND tgu.user_status != '0' AND tgu.group_id_fk = ${groupId}

SELECT tu.id, tu.nickname AS nickName, tu.head_img_url AS headImage, tu.intro, user_group.totalGroup, user_book.totalRead, user_remark.totalRemark, user_rank.num, user_rank.score FROM t_user tu LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tu.id, COUNT(*) AS totalGroup FROM t_user tu, t_group_user tgu, t_group tg WHERE tu.id = tgu.user_id_fk AND tg.id = tgu.group_id_fk AND tgu.user_status != '0' AND tg.`status` != '0' GROUP BY tu.id ) AS user_group ON tu.id = user_group.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tu.id, COUNT(*) AS totalRead FROM t_user tu, t_group_user tgu WHERE tu.id = tgu.user_id_fk AND tgu.user_status = 2 GROUP BY tu.id ) AS user_book ON tu.id = user_book.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tu.id, COUNT(*) AS totalRemark FROM t_user tu, t_remark tr WHERE tu.id = tr.user_id_fk GROUP BY tu.id ) AS user_remark ON tu.id = user_remark.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT (@rowNO := @rowNo + 1) AS num, a.id, a.score FROM ( SELECT ts.user_id_fk AS id, sum(score) AS score FROM t_score ts GROUP BY ts.user_id_fk ORDER BY score DESC ) a, (SELECT @rowNO := 0) b ) AS user_rank ON tu.id = user_rank.id
WHERE tu.id = ${userId}
